inclusion.criterion: breast cancer confined to breast and lymph nodes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: surgical removal of tumor with radiation therapy completed or planned
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tumor expresses estrogen and/or progesterone receptors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: menstrual period within 6 months before starting chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: menstrual periods stopped for at least 8 weeks starting during or after chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ovaries surgically removed or treated with radiation therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: taking medications (Zoladex™ or Lupron™) to block the function of ovaries
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has breast cancer, meets most inclusion criteria, but exclusion criteria not met due to lack of ovarian removal or medication use.
